title: Export Match History?
body: Does anyone know how or another site that allows you to export full Match History into Excel?

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm not sure if there is currently a site around to accomplish this (Google around, maybe you'll find something) however the best way I know to achieve this would be to utilise the [Riot API](https://developer.riotgames.com/) ( The full docs for which can be found [here](https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods) )), although I don't believe you can access a FULL match history, you should be able to pull down most of it.

The specific methods you'll probably want to look into will be

* https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/1060/3659 (Game)
* https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/1069/3683 (Matchlist)
* https://developer.riotgames.com/api/methods#!/1064/3671 (Match)

Some handy tools to help you out

* [Postman for chrome](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/postman/fhbjgbiflinjbdggehcddcbncdddomop?utm_source=chrome-app-launcher-info-dialog)
* [JSON to CSV @ konklone.io](http://konklone.io/json/)
